question: 13 - You work for an international company, would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter-	Explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months-	Say how your work could be done while you are away-	Ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing you this letter to express my interest in the position of solution architect at the head office in the U.S.A.

You know I want to improve my English skills so working the places where people speak it can contribute to my skills. In addition to this, since I did not participate in the meetings in other countries, I want to use my right on this occasion.

Linked with the improvement of technological devices the workers can easily work remotely although it has some drawbacks. I can check my email regularly and do my tasks without delay.  Distance working provides employees flexibility and they do not depend on the places.
I would like that you help me by nominating me for this short period task. If I work there, it will increase my motivation and be fruitful.
I look forward to hearing you from soon.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
